page.title: 05BRIDGE OF WEIR - ECOLOGY
page.content: { Bridge of Weir Angling Club}has{350 {members}and fishes a stretch of the {River Gryffe.}The club has done a great deal of work to clean up the river such as removing scrap iron.{ * *{Last year they removed a bomb!}* * A{water baliff}is employed to repair stiles and remove obstructions.It is also his duty to check that every person fishing has a{legal right}to do so.A close check is kept on poachers and maximum penalties are imposed.Fish in the river include{Salmon,Trout and {Grayling.}The club motto is :-{ { "Why ponder and plod { o'er each tiresome theme. { Take the line and rod { and away to the stream." { The Houstonhead Damn Angling Club}has {55 members.}The club owns{3 boats. Members carry out regular repairs and catch{Perch}and{3 kinds of Trout.
